    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Medicinal Chemistry &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 5, 2015
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/medchem
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

        Print Guide
       </a>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17176732">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176732">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176732">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17176732">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Rachel Hamelers
           <br />
           phone: x 3601
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17176732" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21159775">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21159775">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21159775">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text!
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932507">
          <p>
           When searching for articles, you may find the
           <strong>
            full-text
           </strong>
           of an article
           <strong>
            linked
           </strong>
           in the database. If not:
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Most databases have a
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons. Click the link to check our holdings.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            If there is not a&nbsp;
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons,
            <strong>
             search
             <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
              Encompass
             </a>
            </strong>
            to see if we have access to the full text in print or through another database.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           If we do not have access to the article you need,
           <strong>
            request
           </strong>
           the article via
           <strong>
            Interlibrary Loan
           </strong>
           :
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Many databases have a
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request on Interlibrary Loan
             </em>
            </strong>
            or
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request Item
             </em>
            </strong>
            link or button. Click here to fill out a request form.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            If the database does not have an ILL link embedded, go to the Library Homepage -- Services --
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=article">
             Interlibrary Loan
            </a>
            . Fill out the form. NOTE: Interlibrary Loan can take anywhere from a few day to a few weeks. Plan accordingly.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt16932507" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21159776">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21159776">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21159776">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932480">
          <p>
           <strong>
            TREXLER LIBRARY and LIBRARIES WORLDWIDE
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           Search
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
            Encompass
           </a>
           to find out what books, government publications, journals, videos, etc. you can access through Trexler Library, as well as to see items that other libraries own that may be accessible to you through
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            Interlibrary Loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932480" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17176735">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176735">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176735">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Specific Science Journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176735">
          <div id="boxatt17176735" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240626">
              <a id="link_20240626" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/loi/jmcmar" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240626,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240626}); ">
               The Journal of Medicinal Chemistry
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               available 1996-present through ACS journal subscription
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240636">
              <a id="link_20240636" href="http://pubs.acs.org/loi/jacsat" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240636,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240636}); ">
               The Journal of the American Chemical Society
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through American Chemical Society Web Editions, 1996-present
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240661">
              <a id="link_20240661" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/direct.asp?db=aph&amp;jid=%22NAE%22&amp;scope=site" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240661,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12574996}); ">
               Nature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Access the journal Nature from 1869-1960 on microfilm (Level A of the library), 1960-present in paper journal form (Level B of the library call number 505n), or via Academic Search Complete 1997-12 months ago (selected articles only).
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240691">
              <a id="link_20240691" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/detail?sid=ae717427-6b15-42c8-9fcc-ede886b5817f%40sessionmgr4002&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112&amp;bdata=JnNpdGU9ZWhvc3QtbGl2ZSZzY29wZT1zaXRl#db=aph&amp;jid=SCI" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240691,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974065}); ">
               Science
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Access most issues of the journal Science from the years 1800-present online, or access paper copies of the journal on level B of the library at call number 505s1.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240700">
              <a id="link_20240700" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/journal/10.1002/%28ISSN%291521-3773" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240700,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240700}); ">
               Angewandte Chemie Int. Ed.
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Indexed through the Publisher, individual articles available through Interlibrary Loan
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240710">
              <a id="link_20240710" href="http://www.biochemj.org/bj/402/1/default.htm?S=0" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240710,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240710}); ">
               Biochemical Journal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               available 1906-2006 freely online, newer articles indexed online available through Interlibrary Loan
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17176736">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176736">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176736">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Chemistry Specific Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176736">
          <div id="boxatt17176736" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240745">
              <a id="link_20240745" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/action/showPublications?display=journals" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240745,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325172}); ">
               American Chemical Society Web Editions
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Abstracts and some full-text of peer-reviewed research journals in the chemical and related sciences
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240755">
              <a id="link_20240755" href="https://scifinder.cas.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240755,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325164}); ">
               SciFinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database and research tool including literature from many scientific disciplines, specifically in chemistry, engineering, and materials science. **Patrons must register
               <a href="https://origin-scifinder.cas.org/registration/index.html?corpKey=EAED9FB1-86F3-50AB-4A5D-9970D02A6395">
                here
               </a>
               and are required to have a muhlenberg e-mail address to use this database.**
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17176738">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176738">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176738">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           General Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176738">
          <div id="boxatt17176738" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240578">
              <a id="link_20240578" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240578,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286450}); ">
               PubMed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A service of the National Library of Medicine, includes over 14 million citations for biomedical articles back to the 1950's. These citations are from MEDLINE and additional life science journals. PubMed includes links to many sites providing full text articles and other related resources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240572">
              <a id="link_20240572" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240572,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Large and diverse database that covers most academic disciplines. Contains both scholarly and non-academic resources. Includes many articles in full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240576">
              <a id="link_20240576" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240576,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974075}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access search engine that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly" on the free web. Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Be sure to check library catalog to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240573">
              <a id="link_20240573" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240573,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Searchable collections of full-text journals across many disciplines. Contains full-text of many biology, botany, ecology journal titles. (Note: To restrict results to particular journals/disciplines, from Advanced Search screen, choose discipline category/ies.)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240574">
              <a id="link_20240574" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/search/advanced?sid=598a2239-0fec-45f7-bcff-e7ebc48e2b7c%40sessionmgr4002&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240574,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240574}); ">
               OmniFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Multi-disciplinary database providing the complete content--indexing, abstracts, and full-text--from six of Wilson's full-text databases.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240577">
              <a id="link_20240577" href="http://0-www.sciencedirect.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240577,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974078}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This database includes 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health and life sciences. Coverage spans 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17176739">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176739">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176739">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Reference Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176739">
          <div id="boxatt17176739" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240579">
              <a id="link_20240579" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240579,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Credo Reference provides access to 325 reference works, including general and subject specific dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from over 60 respected publishers across 17 major subject areas--all online, all searchable from one search box.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240580">
              <a id="link_20240580" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240580,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Medicinal Chemistry', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is peer-reviewed or not, on international periodicals. It covers all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4666858" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17176740">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176740">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176740">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176740">
          <p>
           <strong>
            The ACS Style Guide: Effective Communication of Scientific Information
           </strong>
           - in Ready Reference - 808.06654 A187s
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17176740" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21159777">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21159777">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21159777">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16932440">
          <p>
           Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           by filling out the appropriate form for
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=article">
            articles
           </a>
           or
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=book">
            books
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932440" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
